scripts.css: mkdir -p dist/style && lessc --global-var="currentTheme='light'" src/style/style.less dist/style/style-light.css && lessc --global-var="currentTheme='dark'" src/style/style.less dist/style/style-dark.css
scripts.html: mkdir -p dist && npm run pug && cd dist && html *.html
scripts.build: npm run css && npm run js && npm run images && npm run html && npm run fonts
scripts.build:production: npm run build && npm run favicons
scripts.production: npm run build:production && mkdir -p ~/web/marc-hein.de/ppi && cp -R dist/* ~/web/marc-hein.de/ppi/
